sense.name: Move or proceed at an angle.
sense.commentary: NOTE: Denotes movement along a PATH.
sense.examples: He angled his way into the room. The group angled across the meadow. The dog angled for the door.

sense.name: Incline or bend; changle configuration.
sense.examples: She angled the lens to get a wide shot. She angled over the banister. The dancers angled toward the ground.

sense.name: Fish for, perhaps metaphorically.
sense.examples: She angled for compliments. The boat trip angled all day. He angles for women every night.

sense.name: Present information in a biased way.
sense.examples: We have to figure out how to angle the presentation. Newscasters angled the story to make him look bad. We shouldn't have angled the news that way.
